title.narrative: Project for Strengthening the National Rural Transport Program

description.narrative: The project development objective for this operation is to enhance the availability and reliability of transport connectivity for rural communities in participating districts.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Adoption of GRM | Description :The Recipient shall adopt and make operational a grievance redressal mechanismcapable of collecting, tracking, and addressing complaints related to the activities of DoLIDAR including procurement of goods,works and services. | Due Date :31-Mar-2017

Finance Agreement :Department-wide ESMF | Description :The Recipient shall adopt a framework satisfactory to the Association formanaging the environmental and social impacts of the activities of DoLIDAR. | Due Date :31-Mar-2017

Finance Agreement :Establishment of envirnmental and social unit | Description :The Recipient shall establish within DoLIDAR adedicated internal unit for the purpose of managing social and environmental impacts, and provide such unit with the staff, funds,facilities, services, and other resources required to discharge its assigned responsibilities. | Due Date :31-Mar-2017
